summary: The document is a payroll certification for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, dated 09/07/77, covering the accounting period from 08/01/77 to 08/30/77. It details employees' names, positions, social security numbers, annual salaries, and gross pay for the period, along with remarks on appointments, terminations, and payroll changes. Additionally, it includes a summary of the office payroll, certifying the employees' performance of official duties and their compliance with congressional relationship regulations.
key_findings: Detailed payroll record for the Select Committee on Assassinations, listing employees' names, positions, and salaries.
Information on payroll changes, appointments, and terminations during the specified accounting period.
Summary of the office payroll, including employee count, leave without pay, allowance amount, and expenditures.
Certification of employees' official duties performance and absence of prohibited relationships with current members of Congress, unless otherwise noted.
